Verses: 1 aadhalaal, Karththarnimiththam Kattundavanaagiya Naan Ungalukku Sollugira Buththiyennavenil, Neengal Azhaikkappatta Azhaippukkup Paaththiravaangalaai Nadandhu,
2 migundha Manaththaazhmaiyum Saandhamum Neediya Porumaiyum Udaiyavargalaai, Anbinaal Oruvaraiyoruvar Thaangi,
3 samaadhaanakkattinaal Aaviyin Orumaiyaik Kaaththukkolvadharku Jaakkiradhaiyaayirungal.
4 ungalukku Undaana Azhaippinaale Neengal Ore Nambikkaikku Azhaikkappattadhupola, Ore Sareeramum Ore Aaviyum Undu;
5 ore Karththarum, Ore Visuvaasamum, Ore Gnaanasnaanamum,
6 ellaarukkum Ore Dhevanum Pidhaavum Undu; Avar Ellaarmelum, Ellaarodum, Ungal Ellaarukkullum Irukkiravar.
7 kiristhuvinudaiya Eevin Alavukkuththakkadhaaga Nammil Avanavanukkuk Kirubai Alikkappattirukkiradhu.
8 aadhalaal, Avar Unnadhaththirku Eri, Siraippattavargalai Siraiyaakki, Manushargalukku Varangalai Aliththaar Endru Solliyirukkiraar.
9 erinaar Enbadhinaale Avar Adharkumunne Boomiyin Thaazhvidangalil Iranginaar Endru Vilangugiradhallavaa?
10 iranginavare Ellaavatraiyum Nirappaththakkadhaaga, Ellaa Vaanangalukkum Melaaga Unnadhaththirku Erinavarumaayirukkiraar.
11 melum Naam Anaivarum Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaip Patrum Visuvaasaththilum Arivilum Orumaippattavargalaagi, Kirisdhuvinudaiya Niraivaana Valarchchiyin Alavukkuththakka Poorana Purusharaagumvaraikkum,
12 parisuththavaangal Seerporundhumporuttu, Suvisesha Oozhiyaththin Velaikkaagavum, Kiristhuvin Sareeramaagiya Sabaiyaanadhu Bakdhiviruththi Adaivadharkaagavum,
13 avar, Silarai Apposthalaraagavum, Silaraith Theerkkadharisigalaagavum, Silarai Suviseshagaraagavum, Silarai Meypparaagavum, Podhagaraagavum Erpaduththinaar.
14 naam Inik Kuzhandhaigalaayiraamal, Manusharudaiya Soodhum Vanjikkiradharkedhuvaana Thandhiramumulla Podhagamaagiya Palavidha Kaatrinaale Alaigalaippola Adipattu Alaigiravargalaayiraamal,
15 anbudan Saththiyaththaik Kaikondu Thalaiyaagiya Kiristhuvukkul Ellaavatrileyum, Naam Valarugiravargalaayirukkumpadiyaaga Appadich Cheydhaar.

16 avaraale Sareeram Muzhudhum, Adharku Udhaviyaayirukkira Sagala Kanukkalinaalum Isaivaaik Katti Inaikkappattu, Ovvoru Avayavamum Thanthan Alavukkuththakkadhaaik Kiriyaiseygirapadiye, Adhu Anbinaale Thanakku Bakthiviruththi Undaakkugiradharkedhuvaaga Sareeravalarchchiyai Undaakkugiradhu.
17 aadhalaal, Karththarukkul Naan Ungalukku Saatchiyaagach Solli Echcharikkiradhu Ennavenil, Matrap Purajaadhigal Thangal Veenaana Sindhaiyile Nadakkiradhupola Neengal Ini Nadavaamalirungal.
18 avargal Buththiyil Andhagaarappattu, Thangal Irudhaya Kadinaththinaal Thangalil Irukkum Ariyaamaiyinaale Dhevanudaiya Jeevanukku Anniyaraayirundhu;
19 unarvillaadhavargalaai, Sagalavidha Asuththangalaiyum Aavalode Nadappikkumpadi, Thangalaik Kaamavigaaraththirku Oppukkoduththirukkiraargal.
20 neengalo Ivvidhamaaik Kiristhuvaik Katrukkollavillai.
21 yesuvinidaththilulla Saththiyaththinpadiye, Neengal Avaridaththil Kettarindhu, Avaraal Podhikkappatteergale.
22 andhappadi, Mundhina Nadakkaikkuriya Mosampokkum Ichchaigalaale Kettuppogira Pazhaiya Manushanai Neengal Kalaindhupottu,
23 ungal Ullaththile Pudhidhaana Aaviyullavargalaagi,
24 meyyaana Needhiyilum Parisuththaththilum Dhevanudaiya Saayalaaga Sirushtikkappatta Pudhiya Manushanaith Thariththukkollungal.
25 andriyum, Naam Oruvarukkoruvar Avayavangalaayirukkirapadiyaal, Poiyaik Kalaindhu, Avanavan Piranudane Meyyaip Pesakkadavan.
26 neengal Kobankondaalum Paavanjseyyaadhirungal, Sooriyan Asdhamikkiradharku Munnaaga Ungal Erichchal Thaniyakkadavadhu;
27 pisaasukku Idankodaamalum Irungal.
28 thirudugiravan Inith Thirudaamal, Kuraichchalullavanukkuk Kodukkaththakkadhaagath Thanakku Undaayirukkumpadi, Than Kaigalinaal Nalamaana Velaiseydhu, Pirayaasappadakkadavan.
29 ketta Vaarththai Ondrum Ungal Vaayilirundhu Purappadavendaam; Bakthiviruththikku Edhuvaana Nalla Vaarththai Undaanaal Adhaiye Ketkiravanukkup Pirayojanamundaagumpadi Pesungal.
30 andriyum, Neengal Meetkappadumnaalukkendru Muththiraiyaagap Petra Dhevanudaiya Parisuththa Aaviyaith Dhukkappaduththaadhirungal.
31 sagalavidhamaana Kasappum, Kobamum, Moorkkamum, Kookkuralum, Dhooshanamum, Matra Endhath Dhurkkunamum Ungalaivittu Neengakkadavadhu.
32 oruvarukkoruvar Dhayavaayum Manaurukkamaayum Irundhu, Kiristhuvukkul Dhevan Ungalukku Manniththadhupola, Neengalum Oruvarukkoruvar Manniyungal.
